code: import{useState,useEffect}from"react";import LoginPage from"./login/login";import RegisterPage from"./register.js/register";import Matches from"./matches/matches";import TeamsPage from"./teams/teams";import{BrowserRouter as Router,Routes,Route}from'react-router-dom';import LandingPage from"./landingpage/landPage";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[isAdmin,setAdmin]=useState(()=>{const isAdminLocalVariable=localStorage.getItem("isAdmin");return isAdminLocalVariable==="true";});function setStatus(status){localStorage.setItem("isAdmin",status);setAdmin(status);}function handleLogout(){localStorage.removeItem("isAdmin");setAdmin(false);}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Router,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Routes,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(LandingPage,{isAdmin:isAdmin,onLogout:handleLogout})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/login",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(LoginPage,{setStatus:setStatus,isAdmin:isAdmin})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/register",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(RegisterPage,{setStatus:setStatus,isAdmin:isAdmin})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/matches",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Matches,{setStatus:setStatus,isAdmin:isAdmin,onLogout:handleLogout})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/teams",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TeamsPage,{setStatus:setStatus,isAdmin:isAdmin,onLogout:handleLogout})})]})});}export default App;
